title: The Other Side of Paradise
description: In this Dateline classic, Keith Morrison follows a cold case for nearly 10 years, as a father in Hawaii fights to bring his daughter’s killer to justice despite one setback after another. Originally aired on NBC on June 15, 2018.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
